name: Meddlers
description:
Welcome to Meddlers! This is my technically playable game jam project, and the start of a game idea I've been kicking around for a while.

Dust, Gambit, and Sol are a team of mercenaries called the Meddlers. They're fighting a group of bandits and that's about all there is to it storywise at this point.

The world is full of a strange magic called spirit, that grows and shrinks with the morale of your team. Keep it higher than the enemy to do more damage, or channel it into powerful spells with Gambit!

Keyboard controls only at the moment, just another thing to fix up for the next version
